hotelname: Four Points by Sheraton Singapore, Riverview
review_neg: One, staff and front desk manager were not as friendly as they should be when I inquired about why my Marriott Envoy membership program didn't record my trips at this location.  They simply told me that I didn't book with them directly so they can't help much. Two, nobody told me that because of F1,  they would increase my room rate for the last night (almost double). I don't mind paying the market rate, but I do mind that I wasn't informed before.  That was a big surprise to me but to them it's like "Oh, yeah, we had to".
review_text: One, staff and front desk manager were not as friendly as they should be when I inquired about why my Marriott Envoy membership program didn't record my trips at this location.  They simply told me that I didn't book with them directly so they can't help much. Two, nobody told me that because of F1,  they would increase my room rate for the last night (almost double). I don't mind paying the market rate, but I do mind that I wasn't informed before.  That was a big surprise to me but to them it's like "Oh, yeah, we had to".

review_pos: Location is perfect and scenary was beautiful. Right in the middle of down town. Easy to navigate to different tourist attractions by public bus and subways... city is so clean and safe!

I feel more safe if its just a normal single room, especially if you dont know the people staying in the connecting room.

review_neg: I am a Marriot bonvoy member and this is the first time I was told I could not get any points for my stay because the booking was made through booking.com. I have booked other Marriot hotels through third party agencies - I always get some points, even if it is discounted. This time I did not get any, which is weird.The room is small compared to other similar hotels I stayed in Singapore and location not as convenient.

hotelname: Four Points by Sheraton Singapore, Riverview
review_pos: The housekeeping team had little complimentary hamper full of chocolates, ships and other goodies waiting for us when we reached our room after a quick check in. The hotel is located a small footbridge away from loads of cafes and restaurants. Plus the 24 hour gym is fantastic with great quality equipment along with fresh pressed juice, water bottles and clean fresh towels always stocked up. There were also 6 super fast elevators, so we never had to wait more than 10 seconds for a lift/elevator even at busy times of the day.
review_text: The housekeeping team had little complimentary hamper full of chocolates, ships and other goodies waiting for us when we reached our room after a quick check in. The hotel is located a small footbridge away from loads of cafes and restaurants. Plus the 24 hour gym is fantastic with great quality equipment along with fresh pressed juice, water bottles and clean fresh towels always stocked up. There were also 6 super fast elevators, so we never had to wait more than 10 seconds for a lift/elevator even at busy times of the day.

hotelname: Four Points by Sheraton Singapore, Riverview
review_neg: Most upsetting was i asked the reception  if there was buffet breakfast and she was quick to day no only ala carte . I than told her in the news they say hotels can Start but she still  said not yet. Her collegaue tried to say something  but she still said no. Next day we came down for brunch instead only to discover there was buffet brekkie. When they dont know they should ask and not assume. Giving a No should not be the mindset...And online prior to checking in I made a few request and had the feeling this hotel is different they will make it happen. NOt only did it not happen but our room was not beside each other ..was opposite few rooms away..as a parent it felt safer to have my kids next door.  Bathtub request also not fulfilled. The so called sofa in the room we tot we could allow one kid to sleep on was not good enough..and just for only one night to pay over 60 was a bit much..seems like trying to please customer is not in the books..I feel the reviews misled me to choosing this hotel..
review_text: Most upsetting was i asked the reception  if there was buffet breakfast and she was quick to day no only ala carte . I than told her in the news they say hotels can Start but she still  said not yet. Her collegaue tried to say something  but she still said no. Next day we came down for brunch instead only to discover there was buffet brekkie. When they dont know they should ask and not assume. Giving a No should not be the mindset...And online prior to checking in I made a few request and had the feeling this hotel is different they will make it happen. NOt only did it not happen but our room was not beside each other ..was opposite few rooms away..as a parent it felt safer to have my kids next door.  Bathtub request also not fulfilled. The so called sofa in the room we tot we could allow one kid to sleep on was not good enough..and just for only one night to pay over 60 was a bit much..seems like trying to please customer is not in the books..I feel the reviews misled me to choosing this hotel..

hotelname: Four Points by Sheraton Singapore, Riverview
review_pos: The staff very friendly and good selection of restaurants nearby
review_neg: Location was great for us this time but if staying longer would prefer to be closer to a metro ststion.

hotelname: Four Points by Sheraton Singapore, Riverview
review_pos: Rooms were nice with a view.
review_neg: Could have not egg in food. Explained that every time I ordered room service. Twice I had to send back as they ignored my request. Mattress was very hard and uncomfortable. Room still not made up even after returning at 4pm to room.
review_text: Rooms were nice with a view. Could have not egg in food. Explained that every time I ordered room service. Twice I had to send back as they ignored my request. Mattress was very hard and uncomfortable. Room still not made up even after returning at 4pm to room.

hotelname: Four Points by Sheraton Singapore, Riverview
review_pos: Location was very relaxing by the riverside with choice of bars, far enough from shopping malls which were still easy to get by taxi. Personnel was very helpful and efficient.
review_neg: Breakfast was just average due to lack of choice of green vegetables and fruits, anyhow service was very pleasant  and you could get your table prompt.
review_text: Location was very relaxing by the riverside with choice of bars, far enough from shopping malls which were still easy to get by taxi. Personnel was very helpful and efficient. Breakfast was just average due to lack of choice of green vegetables and fruits, anyhow service was very pleasant  and you could get your table prompt.

hotelname: Four Points by Sheraton Singapore, Riverview
review_pos: Location and house keeping staff very good.
review_neg: The laundry price, the holding it to ransom until I paid cash then saying I could of put it on card! Different members of staff telling me different things. Breakfast on one morning was very chaotic, replenishing of items not happening quickly enough. Ok on other 2days. Eggs not hot enough, been sitting there a while I think.
review_text: Location and house keeping staff very good. The laundry price, the holding it to ransom until I paid cash then saying I could of put it on card! Different members of staff telling me different things. Breakfast on one morning was very chaotic, replenishing of items not happening quickly enough. Ok on other 2days. Eggs not hot enough, been sitting there a while I think.

hotelname: Four Points by Sheraton Singapore, Riverview
review_pos: Location is in a pleasant area on river and with restaurants nearby. Our room was fresh and clean and a good size. Staff were very keen to be as helpful as they could. Coming in early in the day after a 13 hour flight we appreciated being able to check in to a room. However, it was not mentioned when the offer was made that there was an additional fee for this. Hotel is located close to a bus stop which includes the  Singapore hop on hop off route. All round, happy with our stay.
review_text: Location is in a pleasant area on river and with restaurants nearby. Our room was fresh and clean and a good size. Staff were very keen to be as helpful as they could. Coming in early in the day after a 13 hour flight we appreciated being able to check in to a room. However, it was not mentioned when the offer was made that there was an additional fee for this. Hotel is located close to a bus stop which includes the  Singapore hop on hop off route. All round, happy with our stay.

review_neg: We were on a floor where rooms were being renovated so strong smell of carpet glue.
review_text: The location, close to restaurants. Pool area was nice. We were on a floor where rooms were being renovated so strong smell of carpet glue.
